name: Certification requirement
text: [§340B-6]  Certification requirement.  All classified wastewater treatment plants whether publicly or privately owned, used or intended for use by the public or private persons, shall at all times be under the direct supervision of an individual whose competency is certified to by the director in a classification corresponding to the classification of the wastewater treatment plant to be supervised. [L 1978, c 169, pt of §2]
